text: Ū zotest, ki kitoʙro ʙar tu nozil kard va ʙa'ze az on ojot muhkam hastand, ki ma'onii on vozeh va ravşan ast va onho asli kitoʙ hastand. Va ʙa'ze az on mutaşoʙihot hastand, ki ehtimolan ma'onii digar ham dorand. Va ammo kasone, ki dar dilhojaşon majl ʙa sui ʙotil ast, ʙaroi fitnaangezī va ta'vili nodurusti on, az pasi mutaşoʙihot meravand va ta'vili onro çuz Alloh kase namedonad. Va soʙitqadamon dar ilm megujand: "Ba hama ojoti Qur'on imon ovardem, hama az çoniʙi Parvardigori most" va çuz xiradmandon pand namepazirand
